home.title: My Development Guide
home.welcome: Welcome to my personal development guide! This space will have documentation of my patterns, best practices and guidelines that I use daily as a developer.
home.commit_patterns: Commit Patterns - Conventions for clear and consistent commit messages
home.best_practices: Best Practices - Code guidelines and project structure
home.work_guidelines: Work Guidelines - Workflows and processes that optimize productivity
home.commit_desc: The foundation for a clean and understandable project history.
home.how_to_use_desc: This is a living repository in constant evolution. Feel free to explore the topics and adapt the patterns as needed for your context.
